explanation: Several participants expressed bearish sentiment and expectation of price drops, with discussion around shorting at 110,000 and signals from technical indicators (VWAP, Ichimoku) supporting short trades. There are also references to retesting support and warnings about following uptrends only if certain price levels are maintained, indicating overall caution or short bias. However, some opinions remain neutral or question how high BTC can go, so the conviction is not high.
